solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int[] twoSum(int[] num, int target) {--newline--        int[] indice = new int[2];--newline--        if (num == null || num.length < 2) return indice;--newline--        int left = 0, right = num.length - 1;--newline--        while (left < right) {--newline--            int v = num[left] + num[right];--newline--            if (v == target) {--newline--                indice[0] = left + 1;--newline--                indice[1] = right + 1;--newline--                break;--newline--            } else if (v > target) {--newline--                right --;--newline--            } else {--newline--                left ++;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return indice;--newline--    }--newline--}
